meanings.definition: A group of people appointed to represent others.
meanings.sent1: The deputation from our town met with the mayor to discuss our concerns.
meanings.sent2: The deputation of students presented their ideas to the school board.
meanings.sent3: The deputation of animals requested a meeting with the farmer to discuss better living conditions.
meanings.sent4: The deputation of stars in the night sky shone brightly, representing the beauty of the universe.
meanings.sent5: The deputation of colorful flowers in the garden stood out, representing nature's diversity.

meanings.definition: The act of appointing someone to represent others.
meanings.sent1: The deputation of a new leader brought hope to the community.
meanings.sent2: The deputation of responsibilities to different team members helped in sharing the workload.
meanings.sent3: The deputation of tasks to the robot made it the busiest member of the team.
meanings.sent4: The deputation of trust to a friend can strengthen the bond between them.
meanings.sent5: The deputation of a guide to the lost hiker ensured they found their way back safely.
